page.title: 06A DAY IN OUR LIVES
page.content: My name is Suzanne Ayers,I am 11 years old.Every Friday night after school I go to Ellen's house.As soon as we get home we get changed into our normal everyday clothes.Then we go out to play until Ellen's mum calls us in and we watch television.Later we make our packed lunches for the following day as we go Morris-dancing every Saturday.After that we have a wash and get changed for bed.Sometimes we do the ironing or the washing.Then make Ellen's mum and ourselves a cup of tea.We go to bed about 10-30pm.In the morning we quickly get washed and changed.When we have finished our breakfast we get our bags ready.Then we set off towards the Jolly Sailor where the coach picks us up.Each weekend we go to different places so that means we have to get up at different times.
